arts.ttl: Paul Pogba future: Juventus 'make decision' on midfielder after doping ban reduced
arts.sum: Paul Pogba and Juventus are allegedly set to agree on a contract termination for the French midfielder after his doping ban was reduced to 18 months.

arts.ttl: Thiago Motta calls for consistency in simulation rulings after Conceicao’s red card
arts.sum: Juventus manager Thiago Motta addressed the controversial second yellow card given to Francisco Conceicao for simulation in the closing stages of their 1-1 draw with Cagliari. While Motta hadn’t seen the replay, he supported the referee’s decision if simulation indeed occurred. “I haven’t seen the images. But if it’s simulation, it’s right,” Motta stated in his post-match press conference. The coach used this incident to call for greater consistency in how simulation is handled across Serie A. Motta elaborated: “It’s something we’ve been talking about for a long time, even in meetings with Rocchi: simulations are not good for the The post Thiago Motta calls for consistency in simulation rulings after Conceicao’s red card appeared first on FootItalia.com.
